queries.description: Containers should not have CAP_SYS_ADMIN Linux capability

files.expected_value: spec.template.spec.initContainers.name=init should not use CAP_SYS_ADMIN Linux capability
spec.template.spec.containers.name=kubearmor should not use CAP_SYS_ADMIN Linux capability

queries.query_name: Non Kube System Pod With Host Mount
queries.description: A non kube-system workload should not have hostPath mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'kubearmor' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/var/run/containerd/containerd.sock' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'kubearmor' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/var/run/containerd/containerd.sock' mounted

files.actual_value: Resource name 'kubearmor' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/sys/kernel/debug' mounted

files.actual_value: Resource name 'kubearmor' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/lib/modules' mounted

files.actual_value: Resource name 'kubearmor' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/sys/fs/bpf' mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'kubearmor' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/etc/apparmor.d' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'kubearmor' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/etc/apparmor.d' mounted

files.expected_value: Resource name 'kubearmor' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' should not have hostPath '/usr/src' mounted
files.actual_value: Resource name 'kubearmor' of kind 'DaemonSet' in non kube-system namespace 'default' has a hostPath '/usr/src' mounted

queries.description: Containers should not run with allowPrivilegeEscalation in order to prevent them from gaining more privileges than their parent process

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kubearmor}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{kubearmor}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false
metadata.name={{kubearmor-relay}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{kubearmor-relay-server}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false
metadata.name={{kubearmor}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{init}}.securityContext.allowPrivilegeEscalation should be set and should be set to false

queries.description: Container should not share the host process ID namespace

files.expected_value: 'spec.template.spec.hostPID' should be set to false or undefined

queries.query_name: Volume Mount With OS Directory Write Permissions
queries.description: Containers can mount sensitive folders from the hosts, giving them potentially dangerous access to critical host configurations and binaries.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kubearmor}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{kubearmor}}.volumeMounts.name={{etc-apparmor-d-path}}.readOnly should be defined and set to true

queries.description: Containers should only run as non-root user. This limits the exploitability of security misconfigurations and restricts an attacker's possibilities in case of compromise

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kubearmor}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{kubearmor}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
metadata.name={{kubearmor-relay}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{kubearmor-relay-server}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true
metadata.name={{kubearmor}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{init}}.securityContext.runAsUser is higher than 0 and/or 'runAsNonRoot' is true

queries.description: Check if containers are running with low UID, which might cause conflicts with the host's user table.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kubearmor-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{kube-rbac-proxy}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be defined
metadata.name={{kubearmor}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{kubearmor}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be defined
metadata.name={{kubearmor}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{init}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be defined
metadata.name={{kubearmor-relay}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{kubearmor-relay-server}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be defined
metadata.name={{kubearmor-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{manager}}.securityContext.runAsUser should be defined

queries.description: Containers should not have extra capabilities allowed

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kubearmor}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{kubearmor}} has no capability added other than NET_BIND_SERVICE
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{kubearmor}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{kubearmor}} has a capability added other than NET_BIND_SERVICE

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kubearmor}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{init}} has no capability added other than NET_BIND_SERVICE
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{kubearmor}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{init}} has a capability added other than NET_BIND_SERVICE

queries.description: Memory limits should be defined for each container. This prevents potential resource exhaustion by ensuring that containers consume not more than the designated amount of memory

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kubearmor}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{init}}.resources.limits.memory should be defined
metadata.name={{kubearmor}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{kubearmor}}.resources.limits.memory should be defined
metadata.name={{kubearmor-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{manager}}.resources.limits.memory should be defined
metadata.name={{kubearmor-relay}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{kubearmor-relay-server}}.resources.limits.memory should be defined

queries.description: Memory requests should be defined for each container. This allows the kubelet to reserve the requested amount of system resources and prevents over-provisioning on individual nodes

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kubearmor-relay}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{kubearmor-relay-server}}.resources.requests.memory should be defined
metadata.name={{kubearmor}}.spec.template.spec.initContainers.name={{init}}.resources.requests.memory should be defined
metadata.name={{kubearmor}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{kubearmor}}.resources.requests.memory should be defined

queries.description: Containers should drop 'ALL' or at least 'NET_RAW' capabilities

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kubearmor-relay}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{kubearmor-relay-server}}.securityContext.capabilities.drop should be defined

queries.description: The permission to create pods in a cluster should be restricted because it allows privilege escalation.

files.expected_value: metadata.name=kubearmor-controller-clusterrole.rules.verbs should not contain the value 'create' when metadata.name=kubearmor-controller-clusterrole.rules.resources contains the value 'pods'
files.actual_value: metadata.name=kubearmor-controller-clusterrole.rules.verbs contains the value 'create' and metadata.name=kubearmor-controller-clusterrole.rules.resources contains the value 'pods'

queries.description: CPU limits should be set because if the system has CPU time free, a container is guaranteed to be allocated as much CPU as it requests

files.expected_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=manager has limits defined
spec.template.spec.containers.name=kubearmor-relay-server has resources defined
spec.template.spec.initContainers.name=init has resources defined
spec.template.spec.containers.name=kubearmor has resources defined

queries.description: CPU requests should be set to ensure the sum of the resource requests of the scheduled Containers is less than the capacity of the node

files.expected_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=kubearmor should have resources defined
spec.template.spec.initContainers.name=init should have resources defined
spec.template.spec.containers.name=kubearmor-relay-server should have resources defined

queries.query_name: Image Pull Policy Of The Container Is Not Set To Always
queries.description: Image Pull Policy of the container must be defined and set to Always

files.actual_value: metadata.name={{kubearmor-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{kube-rbac-proxy}}.imagePullPolicy relies on mutable images in cache

queries.description: Image tag must be defined and not be empty or equal to latest.

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kubearmor-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{manager}}.image tag is provided and not latest
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{kubearmor-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{manager}}.image tag is not provided or latest

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kubearmor-relay}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{kubearmor-relay-server}}.image tag is provided and not latest
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{kubearmor-relay}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{kubearmor-relay-server}}.image tag is not provided or latest

queries.description: Containers should be configured with an AppArmor profile to enforce fine-grained access control over low-level system resources

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kubearmor-controller}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations[container.apparmor.security.beta.kubernetes.io/manager] should be set to 'runtime/default' or 'localhost'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{kubearmor-controller}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations[container.apparmor.security.beta.kubernetes.io/manager] does not specify a valid AppArmor profile

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kubearmor-relay}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{kubearmor-relay-server}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{kubearmor-relay}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{kubearmor-relay-server}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kubearmor}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations should specify an AppArmor profile for container {{init}}
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{kubearmor}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations does not specify an AppArmor profile for container {{init}}

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kubearmor}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations[container.apparmor.security.beta.kubernetes.io/kubearmor] should be set to 'runtime/default' or 'localhost'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{kubearmor}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations[container.apparmor.security.beta.kubernetes.io/kubearmor] does not specify a valid AppArmor profile

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kubearmor-controller}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations[container.apparmor.security.beta.kubernetes.io/kube-rbac-proxy] should be set to 'runtime/default' or 'localhost'
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{kubearmor-controller}}.spec.template.metadata.annotations[container.apparmor.security.beta.kubernetes.io/kube-rbac-proxy] does not specify a valid AppArmor profile

queries.description: Sees if Kubernetes Drop Capabilities exists to ensure containers security context

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kubearmor-relay}}.spec.containers.name=kubearmor-relay-server.securityContext should be set

queries.description: Each namespace should have a LimitRange policy associated to ensure that resource allocations of Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims do not exceed the defined boundaries

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kubearmor-relay}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{kubearmor-relay}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kubearmor-controller}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{kubearmor-controller}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kubearmor}} has a 'LimitRange' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{kubearmor}} does not have a 'LimitRange' policy associated

queries.description: Each namespace should have a ResourceQuota policy associated to limit the total amount of resources Pods, Containers and PersistentVolumeClaims can consume

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kubearmor-relay}} has a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{kubearmor-relay}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kubearmor-controller}} has a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{kubearmor-controller}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

files.expected_value: metadata.name={{kubearmor}} has a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated
files.actual_value: metadata.name={{kubearmor}} does not have a 'ResourceQuota' policy associated

files.actual_value: spec.template.spec.containers.name=kubearmor-relay-server does not have a security context

metadata.name={{kubearmor-controller}}.spec.template.spec.containers.name={{kube-rbac-proxy}}.securityContext.readOnlyRootFilesystem should be set to true
